message: She was part of of the conspiracy to defraud SAX and enjoy the dividends for doing nothing. She approached them Yes this is how third party contracts work in SA. Ben Cole,She Has it been established what she contractually should have received for managing the two airports. Yesterday she said she decided to whistleblow by threatening to go to a newspaper because she felt she had become a servant in her own company. But her ‚Äúnativity‚Äù is beyond belief. "Watson Mustangs Born Free. We don‚Äôt know what party she belongs to.But does it matter? At least she spilt the beans. "Magareth Waterboer. Like in a court Is the NPA representative listening. Gareth Davies? Really. She seems confident to me. Not shifty at all. And South Africans complain about Nigerians! Our reputation as a nation shot into pieces. "Is this Bye bye Thuma Mina?Houston She won‚Äôt only need Trengrove. She will need protection too. Flee to Botswana and don‚Äôt tell anyone where you are. We no longer have to wonder why the NW province was placed under administration and why Mahumopelo was dismissed as premier. "After today Correct Norman Zwane Our president and his executive must and will have to fight to overcome this widespread perception of corruption and hopelessness. Do this before it overcomes the nation‚Äôs psyche and belief in SA Any qualified lawyers on the chat group? Can this witness be deemed complicit in this scam simply because it took her this long to whistleblow? But must this witness also run? Or seek a team of defence lawyers? Lesson I have once again earnt. Wait until you have all the facts before you form an opinion about something/someone. "Magda Seguin One foresees that ‚ÄúPay back the money‚Äù will become the continuing mantra for some politicians in parliament from this day on.
